picked_headlines.summary: STAGE models LLM workloads for system optimization and architecture exploration.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a framework that could significantly impact both technical and managerial domains by optimizing AI systems and exploring new architectures.

picked_headlines.summary: AI framework automates e-commerce product knowledge graph construction.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is relevant for stakeholders interested in product development and engineering, offering insights into automating data integration in e-commerce.

digest:
- *STAGE* models LLM workloads for system optimization and architecture exploration. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10480)
- *AI framework* automates e-commerce product knowledge graph construction. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11017)
- *MeZO* enhances on-device AI fine-tuning without backpropagation. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11362)
- *MoBA* offers efficient attention mechanisms for LLMs with GPU implementation. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11571)
- *Text2SQL-Flow* improves Text-to-SQL performance with SQL-aware data augmentation. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10192)
- *SemanticNN* ensures semantic correctness in AI offloading for weak devices. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11038)
- *MOON* boosts e-commerce ads CTR by 20% with multimodal learning. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11305)
- *FakeZero* detects misinformation on social media while preserving privacy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25932)
- *Mining-Gym* offers a new RL benchmarking tool for truck dispatch scheduling. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.19195)
- *HARNESS* enhances safety in DOE environments through human-agent collaboration. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10810)
- *AIonopedia* uses multimodal learning for ionic liquid discovery. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11257)
- *StreamDiT* enables real-time text-to-video generation with improved quality. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.03745)
- *EcoAlign* proposes a cost-effective framework for LVLM alignment. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11301)
- *FedALT* enhances federated fine-tuning with adaptive local training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.11880)
- *Thinker* structures LLM reasoning hierarchically for better search efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07943)
